Author: akira0245, Ori
Name: MidiBard 2
Punchline:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Description:
Bard performance using midi files or keyboard.
- Solo and ensemble mode support
- Text commands for instrument equip and switch
Supported by FFXIV Bards & Bands Community: discord.gg/ff14bard
Changelog:
+ Use regex to identify track names, better compatibility for some old MIDI files.
+ Saves the last folder of file import.
+ Even better sync on some lower-end PCs.

- Remove auto set background frame limitation functon as it's been implemented in Bard Toolbox in a more elegant way. Please Google and install Bard Toolbox if you need this function.
